languages.text: "Воздействие варп-энергией наверняка приведет к взрывной реакции. Я не знаю точно механизм этой мутации — быть может, последствия будут еще чудовищнее, чем их нынешнее состояние".
"The effect of warp energy will likely lead to an explosive reaction. I do not know the precise mechanism of this mutation — the result could be even more monstrous than its current state."
languages.original_text: "Воздействие варп-энергией наверняка приведет к взрывной реакции. Я не знаю точно механизм этой мутации — быть может, последствия будут еще чудовищнее, чем их нынешнее состояние".

traits.locale_text: "The effect of warp energy will likely lead to an explosive reaction. I do not know the precise mechanism of this mutation — the result could be even more monstrous than its current state."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The effect of warp energy will likely lead to an explosive reaction. I do not know the precise mechanism of this mutation — the result could be even more monstrous than its current state."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The effect of warp energy will likely lead to an explosive reaction. I do not know the precise mechanism of this mutation — the result could be even more monstrous than its current state."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The effect of warp energy will likely lead to an explosive reaction. I do not know the precise mechanism of this mutation — the result could be even more monstrous than its current state."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “亚空间能量的影响，可能会导致爆炸性的反应。我并不清楚这种变异的具体原理如何。如果这么做的话，很可能会让这只怪物变得比现在更加畸形。”
languages.original_text: "The effect of warp energy will likely lead to an explosive reaction. I do not know the precise mechanism of this mutation — the result could be even more monstrous than its current state."

traits.locale_text: “亚空间能量的影响，可能会导致爆炸性的反应。我并不清楚这种变异的具体原理如何。如果这么做的话，很可能会让这只怪物变得比现在更加畸形。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «El efecto de las energías de la disformidad causará con toda probabilidad una reacción explosiva. Desconozco el funcionamiento exacto de esta mutación; el resultado podría ser aún más monstruoso que su estado actual».
languages.original_text: "The effect of warp energy will likely lead to an explosive reaction. I do not know the precise mechanism of this mutation — the result could be even more monstrous than its current state."

traits.locale_text: «El efecto de las energías de la disformidad causará con toda probabilidad una reacción explosiva. Desconozco el funcionamiento exacto de esta mutación; el resultado podría ser aún más monstruoso que su estado actual».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「歪みエネルギーの影響により、爆発的な反応が起こる可能性が高い。この変異の正確なメカニズムはわかりませんが…結果は現状よりもさらに恐ろしいものになるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "The effect of warp energy will likely lead to an explosive reaction. I do not know the precise mechanism of this mutation — the result could be even more monstrous than its current state."

traits.locale_text: 「歪みエネルギーの影響により、爆発的な反応が起こる可能性が高い。この変異の正確なメカニズムはわかりませんが…結果は現状よりもさらに恐ろしいものになるかもしれません」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Der Effekt von Warp-Energie wäre wahrscheinlich eine Explosion. Ich kenne den genauen Mechanismus dieser Mutation nicht – das Resultat könnte noch monströser sein als der aktuelle Zustand."
languages.original_text: "The effect of warp energy will likely lead to an explosive reaction. I do not know the precise mechanism of this mutation — the result could be even more monstrous than its current state."

traits.locale_text: "Der Effekt von Warp-Energie wäre wahrscheinlich eine Explosion. Ich kenne den genauen Mechanismus dieser Mutation nicht – das Resultat könnte noch monströser sein als der aktuelle Zustand."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « L'effet de l'énergie du Warp entraînera probablement une réaction explosive, et comme je ne connais pas les mécanismes exacts de cette mutation, le résultat pourrait être encore plus monstrueux. »
languages.original_text: "The effect of warp energy will likely lead to an explosive reaction. I do not know the precise mechanism of this mutation — the result could be even more monstrous than its current state."

traits.locale_text: « L'effet de l'énergie du Warp entraînera probablement une réaction explosive, et comme je ne connais pas les mécanismes exacts de cette mutation, le résultat pourrait être encore plus monstrueux. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Öteboyut enerjisinin etkisi, muhtemelen patlayıcı bir tepkiye sebep olacaktır. Bu mutasyonun çalışma mekanizmasına dair kesin bir bilgim yok. Mevcut durumdan çok daha feci bir neticeyle karşılaşabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "The effect of warp energy will likely lead to an explosive reaction. I do not know the precise mechanism of this mutation — the result could be even more monstrous than its current state."

traits.locale_text: “Öteboyut enerjisinin etkisi, muhtemelen patlayıcı bir tepkiye sebep olacaktır. Bu mutasyonun çalışma mekanizmasına dair kesin bir bilgim yok. Mevcut durumdan çok daha feci bir neticeyle karşılaşabiliriz.”
